author: Joshua Berlinger, CNN
title: How Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelensky went from an actor playing president on TV to defiant wartime leader
description: The comedian-turned-president came to power on the promise of bringing peace to Ukraine's east. Now he's taken on a wartime role.
content:
(CNN)Volodymyr Zelensky approached a lectern under bright lights, preparing to deliver a message to the Ukrainian people.
"Today I will start with long-awaited words, which I wish to announce with pâ€¦ [+5304 chars]
